name: Pyro Ward
description:
The character to which this is attached takes no DMG.
This status will provide 2 instances of Pyro Application (Can be depleted using Elemental Reactions): Once the instances are depleted, this status will be removed, and the character to which this is attached will be unable to use Skills until the end of this Round.
descriptionraw: The character to which this is attached <color=#FFFFFFFF>takes no DMG</color>.\nThis status will provide 2 instances of <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro Application</color> (Can be depleted using Elemental Reactions): Once the instances are depleted, this status will be removed, and the character to which this is attached will be <color=#FFFFFFFF>unable to use Skills</color> until the end of this Round.
